name: Shaghayegh Bazrafkan
about: I’m Shaghayegh Bazrafkan, a motivated Front-End Developer passionate about designing and building modern, user-friendly interfaces. I specialize in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, Tailwind CSS, Sass, jQuery, and Git, and I’m well-versed in API integration using Fetch, Axios, Context API, and React Query. I have experience working on a variety of projects, from practice exercises to advanced applications, which has strengthened my ability to design and implement responsive, interactive user interfaces. I’m always eager to learn new technologies and apply them in real-world projects, and I’m ready to contribute my skills and knowledge in professional, team-oriented environments.
companyname1: intern web designer / imen ertebat varan
touch: Whether you have a project in mind, looking for a fresh collaboration, or just feel like saying hi—I’d love to hear fro  you. I’m always up for new experiences and gre conversations. Drop me a message, I’m all ears!
placeholder massage: I'd love to hear from you — whether it's an idea, a project, or just a quick hello.

project1.title: portfolio project
project1.des: In a portfolio page, the goal is to showcase your skills, projects, experiences, and contact information in a way that allows visitors—such as potential employers or clients—to quickly gain a clear understanding of your abilities.

project2.title: Shaghayegh Store
project2.des: Shaghayegh is a lightweight and fast online store designed for businesses that want to start selling online without complexity. The project focuses on simplicity, speed, and a smooth mobile-first user experience, making it a smart starting point for building your digital presence and boosting your sales.

project3.title: Fotros Store
project3.des: Fotros is a professional and attractive online store that increases sales, strengthens your brand, and provides customers with a smooth and enjoyable shopping experience. A website ready for real growth and business success.
